00037 /* Sched status flags */
00038 #define XNKCOUT  0x80000000     /* Sched callout context */
00039 #define XNHTICK  0x40000000     /* Host tick pending  */
00040 #define XNRPICK  0x20000000     /* Check RPI state */
00041 #define XNINTCK  0x10000000     /* In master tick handler context */
00042 #define XNINIRQ  0x08000000     /* In IRQ handling context */
00043 #define XNSWLOCK 0x04000000     /* In context switch */
00044

00050 #endif /* CONFIG_XENO_OPT_PRIOCPL */
00051 };

00104 struct xnsched_class {
00105 
00106         void (*sched_init)(struct xnsched *sched);
00107         void (*sched_enqueue)(struct xnthread *thread);
00108         void (*sched_dequeue)(struct xnthread *thread);
00109         void (*sched_requeue)(struct xnthread *thread);
00110         struct xnthread *(*sched_pick)(struct xnsched *sched);
00111         void (*sched_tick)(struct xnthread *curr);
00112         void (*sched_rotate)(struct xnsched *sched, int prio);
00113         void (*sched_migrate)(struct xnthread *thread,
00114                               struct xnsched *sched);
00115         void (*sched_setparam)(struct xnthread *thread,
00116                                const union xnsched_policy_param *p);
00117         void (*sched_getparam)(struct xnthread *thread,
00118                                union xnsched_policy_param *p);
00119         void (*sched_trackprio)(struct xnthread *thread,
00120                                 const union xnsched_policy_param *p);
00121         void (*sched_forget)(struct xnthread *thread);
00122 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_PRIOCPL

00124                                            struct xnthread *thread);
00125         void (*sched_pop_rpi)(struct xnthread *thread);

00127 #endif
00128         struct xnsched_class *next;
00129         int weight;
00130         const char *name;
00131 };

00133 #define XNSCHED_CLASS_MAX_THREADS       32768
00134 #define XNSCHED_CLASS_WEIGHT(n)         (n * XNSCHED_CLASS_MAX_THREADS)

00136 /* Placeholder for current thread priority */

00139 #ifdef CONFIG_SMP
00140 #define xnsched_cpu(__sched__)  ((__sched__) - &nkpod->sched[0])
00141 #else /* !CONFIG_SMP */
00142 #define xnsched_cpu(__sched__)  ({ (void)__sched__; 0; })
00143 #endif /* CONFIG_SMP */
00144 
00145 /* Test all resched flags from the given scheduler mask. */
00146 #define xnsched_resched_p(__sched__)                    \
00147   (!xnarch_cpus_empty((__sched__)->resched))
00148 
00149 /* Set self resched flag for the given scheduler. */
00150 #define xnsched_set_self_resched(__sched__)             \
00151   xnarch_cpu_set(xnsched_cpu(__sched__), (__sched__)->resched)
00152 
00153 /* Set specific resched flag into the local scheduler mask. */
00154 #define xnsched_set_resched(__sched__)                  \
00155     xnarch_cpu_set(xnsched_cpu(__sched__), xnpod_current_sched()->resched)

00229 static inline void xnsched_tick(struct xnthread *curr)
00230 {
00231         struct xnsched_class *sched_class = curr->sched_class;
00232 
00233         if (sched_class != &xnsched_class_idle)
00234                 sched_class->sched_tick(curr);
00235 }

00239 static inline void xnsched_enqueue(struct xnthread *thread)
00240 {
00241         struct xnsched_class *sched_class = thread->sched_class;
00242 
00243         if (sched_class != &xnsched_class_idle)
00244                 thread->sched_class->sched_enqueue(thread);
00245 }
00246 
00247 static inline void xnsched_dequeue(struct xnthread *thread)
00248 {
00249         struct xnsched_class *sched_class = thread->sched_class;
00250 
00251         if (sched_class != &xnsched_class_idle)
00252                 thread->sched_class->sched_dequeue(thread);
00253 }
00254 
00255 static inline void xnsched_requeue(struct xnthread *thread)
00256 {
00257         struct xnsched_class *sched_class = thread->sched_class;
00258 
00259         if (sched_class != &xnsched_class_idle)
00260                 sched_class->sched_requeue(thread);
00261 }
00262 
00263 static inline int xnsched_weighted_bprio(struct xnthread *thread)
00264 {
00265         return thread->bprio + thread->sched_class->weight;
00266 }
00267 
00268 static inline int xnsched_weighted_cprio(struct xnthread *thread)
00269 {
00270         return thread->cprio + thread->sched_class->weight;
00271 }

00291 static inline void xnsched_forget(struct xnthread *thread)
00292 {
00293         struct xnsched_class *sched_class = thread->sched_class;
00294 
00295         if (sched_class->sched_forget)
00296                 sched_class->sched_forget(thread);

00316 /*
00317  * If only the RT scheduling class is compiled in, we may fully inline
00318  * common helpers for it.
00319  */
00320 
00321 static inline void xnsched_enqueue(struct xnthread *thread)
00322 {
00323         struct xnsched_class *sched_class = thread->sched_class;
00324 
00325         if (sched_class != &xnsched_class_idle)
00326                 __xnsched_rt_enqueue(thread);
00327 }
00328 
00329 static inline void xnsched_dequeue(struct xnthread *thread)
00330 {
00331         struct xnsched_class *sched_class = thread->sched_class;
00332 
00333         if (sched_class != &xnsched_class_idle)
00334                 __xnsched_rt_dequeue(thread);
00335 }
00336 
00337 static inline void xnsched_requeue(struct xnthread *thread)
00338 {
00339         struct xnsched_class *sched_class = thread->sched_class;
00340 
00341         if (sched_class != &xnsched_class_idle)
00342                 __xnsched_rt_requeue(thread);
00343 }
00344 
00345 static inline int xnsched_weighted_bprio(struct xnthread *thread)
00346 {
00347         return thread->bprio;
00348 }
00349 
00350 static inline int xnsched_weighted_cprio(struct xnthread *thread)
00351 {
00352         return thread->cprio;

00355 static inline void xnsched_setparam(struct xnthread *thread,
00356                                     const union xnsched_policy_param *p)
00357 {
00358         struct xnsched_class *sched_class = thread->sched_class;
00359 
00360         if (sched_class != &xnsched_class_idle)
00361                 __xnsched_rt_setparam(thread, p);
00362         else
00363                 __xnsched_idle_setparam(thread, p);
00364 }
00365 
00366 static inline void xnsched_getparam(struct xnthread *thread,
00367                                     union xnsched_policy_param *p)
00368 {
00369         struct xnsched_class *sched_class = thread->sched_class;
00370 
00371         if (sched_class != &xnsched_class_idle)
00372                 __xnsched_rt_getparam(thread, p);
00373         else
00374                 __xnsched_idle_getparam(thread, p);
00375 }
00376 
00377 static inline void xnsched_trackprio(struct xnthread *thread,
00378                                      const union xnsched_policy_param *p)
00379 {
00380         struct xnsched_class *sched_class = thread->sched_class;
00381 
00382         if (sched_class != &xnsched_class_idle)
00383                 __xnsched_rt_trackprio(thread, p);
00384         else
00385                 __xnsched_idle_trackprio(thread, p);
00386 }
